comment_detailed: I searched the Methods and Results sections for glycemic measures. The study reports fasting glucose (mg/dL) at baseline and week 24 for each group. Baseline and week‑24 values are in Table 3, but SDs are not clearly labeled; I inferred them from the table’s second numeric column. No HbA1c data were reported, so only FPG is included. The study ID is not provided, so it is null. Missing fields: study_metadata.study_id, outcomes[0].baseline_sd, outcomes[0].followup_sd. Evidence: "Glucose (mg/dL) 91.7 68.96" and "Glucose (mg/dL) ... 66.25 2.81".
comment: Extracted FPG data; study ID unknown.
